interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2015/12/16
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Greg Nicotero', 'Michael E. Satrazemis', 'David Boyd'], 'Starring': ['Norman Reedus : Daryl Dixon', 'Melissa McBride : Carol Peletier : Carol'], 'Studio': ['Starz']}
Review Text: Just when you thought things couldn't get much worse. Love this series. I am a faithful fan. This season kept me on the edge of my seat. Wasn't sure who would make it out alive. We are starting to see some  of the characters unravel from all they've been through, which should be no surprise. Lots of walkers and blood and gore. Still enjoying the great acting, directing and story plot, even after 6 seasons.
Review Title: Terrific Series!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

actual_interaction.title: Terrific Series!
actual_interaction.text: Just when you thought things couldn't get much worse. Love this series. I am a faithful fan. This season kept me on the edge of my seat. Wasn't sure who would make it out alive. We are starting to see some  of the characters unravel from all they've been through, which should be no surprise. Lots of walkers and blood and gore. Still enjoying the great acting, directing and story plot, even after 6 seasons.
